name: EpilepsyTonicClonicICDCM10
title: Epilepsy Tonic Clonic ICDCM10
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains ICD10CM concepts for epilepsy that indicate a patient may experience tonic-clonic seizures.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people diagnosed with epilepsy that might may experience tonic-clonic seizures. This element may map to "Diagnosis" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Epilepsy diagnostic codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Simple partial seizures and infantile spasms)
